roleset.name: put, place
roleset.note: SET-V NOTES: based on survey of initial sentences of big corpusand comparison with 'put'. Member of VNcls put-9.1-2, braid-41.2.2, image_impression-25.1 (from set.01-v)
SETTING-N NOTES: ~set.01 (from setting.01-n)

example.name: set-v: physically set/put/place
example.text: Jerry set the glass on the table

example.name: set-v: medical example
example.text: After the doctor's setting of his tibia, Jaime was allowed to go home.

roleset.name: establish
roleset.note: SET-V NOTES: (from set.02-v)

example.name: set-v: just transitive
example.text: Judge Curry's order set a precedent for a second nuclear rate case.
example.arg: a precedent for a second nuclear rate case

roleset.name: make ready, assign a task to, ready for action
roleset.note: SET-V NOTES: Member of Vncls force-59-1. Updated by Julia, Adjectival usage based on BOLT-1. (from set.08-v)
SET-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from set.08-j)

example.name: set-v: on your mark, get set, go
example.text: According to one analyst, [workers at the Cananea copper mine in Mexico, which hasn't been operating since it was declared bankrupt by the Mexican government in late August]-2, are set [*trace*-2]-3 [*-3] to return to work.
example.arg: [*trace*-2]-3 --> workers at the Cananea copper mine in Mexico, which hasn't been operating since it was declared bankrupt by the Mexican government in late August

example.name: set-v: all args, lovely example
example.text: Her master beat her and set her to herding donkeys.

example.name: set-j
example.arg: Former Welterweight foes Miguel Cotto and Antonio Margarito
to be squaring off in another Puerto Rico versus Mexico slugfest

example.name: set-j: arg1
example.text: I actually ended up contacting a friend in fort greene to stay with so I 'm all set . Thanks for the offer though man !

roleset.name: go down
roleset.note: SET-V NOTES: No Vncls. (from set.11-v)

example.name: set-v: all work and no play
example.text: Chung Hsiu-mei, a member of the Meinung People's Association, says that farmers go to work [when]-9 the sun comes up [*T*]-9, and rest [when]-1 it sets [*T*] -1

roleset.name: make ready, prepare
roleset.note: SET-V NOTES: VN class preparing-26.3-2 (from set.14-v)

example.name: set-v: All args
example.text: She set the table for the four of them.

roleset.name: fixed, fixated, decided on
roleset.note: SET-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from set.16-j)

roles.note: There is room for an arg0-cause if we need to unify this. It corresponds to 'he set his sights on'. (from set.16-j)

example.name: set-j: args 1, 2
example.text: Kendall 's set on xr but I 'd rather go to ck . I just feel bad since it 's her bday

roleset.name: set off: begin travel
roleset.note: SET_OFF-V NOTES: Member of VNcls escape-51.1-2. Updated by julia, 11/2010, changed to 51.1 (from set.04-v)

example.name: set_off-v: on the road again...
example.text: A disaffected, hard-drinking, nearly-30 hero sets off for snow country in search of an elusive sheep with a start on its back at the behest of a sinister, erudite mobster with a Stanford degree.
example.arg: in search of an elusive sheep with a start on its back at the behest of a sinister, erudite mobster with a Stanford degree

roleset.name: set off a bomb, start a chain reaction
roleset.note: SET_OFF-V NOTES: Member of Vncls engender-27. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from set.05-v)

example.name: set_off-v: genetic bomb
example.text: He assumed the missing piece contained a gene or genes whose-1 loss *trace-1*-2 had a critical role in *trace-2* setting off the cancer.

roleset.name: set off: complement, balance (like 'offset')
roleset.note: SET_OFF-V NOTES: (from set.13-v)

example.name: set_off-v: aesthetics
example.text: Stainless steel, silver, and aluminum set off black granite table tops and a gray terrazzo.
example.arg: black granite table tops and a gray terrazzo

roleset.name: start to do
roleset.note: SET_ABOUT-V NOTES: Frameset created by Jena. Comparison to Verbnet begin-55.1, member of VNcls confront-98. (from set.12-v)

example.name: set_about-v:
example.text: The house of Han therefore quite consciously set about the task of * establishing a great unified empire.
example.arg: the task of * establishing a great unified empire

roleset.name: set out: establish
roleset.note: SET_OUT-V NOTES: See Vncls 98. (from set.06-v)

example.name: set_out-v: an offer you can't refuse
example.text: A key provision in the current version of the charter would give the commission a mandate to produce an ``action program'' detailing on what points EC member states would be required to comply with [the goals]-1 set [*]-1 out in the charter.

roleset.name: set out: begin
roleset.note: SET_OUT-V NOTES: Member of Vncls escape-51.1-2. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from set.07-v)

example.name: set_out-v: begin travel
example.text: On her husband's 50th birthday (after an auspicious 23 years of marriage, it should be noted), Betsy, Al and their college-bound son set out for New York to visit Fordham University.
example.arg: On her husband's 50th birthday (after an auspicious 23 years of marriage, it should be noted)
Betsy, Al, and their college-bound son

example.name: set_out-v: begin a task
example.text: Bioengineers set out [*-1] to duplicate that feat -- scientifically and commercially -- with new life forms.
example.arg: [*-1] to duplicate that feat -- scientifically and commercially -- with new life forms

roleset.name: set up: establish, establish
roleset.note: SET_UP-V NOTES: No Vncls. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from set.03-v)
SETTING_UP-N NOTES: Based on ontonotes nouns. Comparison to set.03. No VN class. Framed by Katie. (from setting.02-n)

example.name: set_up-v: set in place
example.text: Kawasaki-Rikuso, a freight company, set up its own software subsidiary this year and is spending nearly a year's profit to more than double the computer terminals at its main office.

example.name: set_up-v: establish with an attribute
example.text: [The Securities and Exchange Board of India]-1 was set up *trace*-1 earlier this year along the lines of the US Securities and Exchange Commission.
example.arg: along the lines of the US Securities and Exchange Commission.

example.name: settin_up-n: arg 1
example.text: The UN resolution also calls for the setting up of what it calls the Human Rights Enquiry Commission.
example.arg: of what it calls the Human Rights Enquiry Commission

roleset.name: trap, ensnare, trick
roleset.note: SET_UP-V NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from set.15-v)

example.name: set_up-v: passive
example.text: Christie-1 is being set *-1 up on this one and the legislature called his bluff

example.name: set_up-v: All args
example.text: An exotic dancer is in custody after a man she met at a strip club told police that she set him up to be robbed, court records show.

roleset.name: put into position
roleset.note: SET_DOWN-V NOTES: (from set.09-v)

example.name: set_down-v: automatically generated
example.text: Why-2 should [a white hotel]-1 be set [*-1]down in the center of Black Bottom [*T*-2] ? ?
example.arg: in the center of Black Bottom

roleset.name: (cause to) be attacked
roleset.note: SET_UPON-V NOTES: (from set.10-v)

example.name: set_upon-v
example.text: Once she told us about the time [ *0*]-2 [ she]-1 was set upon [*]-1 by a robber at a beauty parlor [*T*] -2

roleset.name: establish
roleset.note: SET_FORTH-V NOTES: Added by Julia, Meredith for Google. Comparison to set_out.06

example.name: name-v
example.text: I know of no other purpose of the Liberal League than what [*-1]-2 was set *-2 forth in the charter.
